mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BGNAME, BGUSED, BGREPLY, BGREADONLY, BGNOTICE FROM TBL_BOARDGROUP WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND BGNO=#{bgno} AND BGUSED='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO

SELECT TBG.BGNAME , TB.BRDNO , TB.BRDTITLE , TB.BRDMEMO , DATE_FORMAT(TB.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as REGDATE , TB.BRDLIKE , TB.USERNO , USERNM as BRDWRITER , TB.BGNO , TB.ETC1 , TB.ETC2 , TB.ETC3 , TB.ETC4 , TB.ETC5 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) as BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND DELETEFLAG = 'N') as FILECNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') as REPLYCNT FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO
ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BGNO, BRDTITLE, USERNO, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, REGDATE, DELETEFLAG, CHGDATE, CHGUSERNO) VALUES (#{bgno}, #{brdtitle}, #{userno}, #{brdmemo}, #{brdnotice}, NOW(), 'N', NOW(), #{userno} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT BGNO , BRDNO , BRDTITLE , USERNM as BRDWRITER , BRDMEMO , BRDNOTICE , BRDLIKE , DATE_FORMAT(TB.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as REGDATE , TB.USERNO , TB.ETC1 , TB.ETC2 , TB.ETC3 , TB.ETC4 , TB.ETC5 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) as BRDHIT , (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_BOARDLIKE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND USERNO=#{field2}) as BRDLIKECHK FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE TB.DELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{field1}
SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDREAD(BRDNO, USERNO, REGDATE) VALUES (#{field1}, #{field2}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE REGDATE=NOW()
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDLIKE(BRDNO, USERNO, REGDATE) VALUES (#{field1}, #{field2}, NOW())
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND DELETEFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILE (BRDNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (#{parentPK}, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(TBR.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as REGDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REORDER

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM as REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(TBR.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as REGDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno}
SELECT BRDNO, REDEPTH+1 as REDEPTH , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(REORDER) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=TB.RENO), TB.REORDER) as REORDER FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TB WHERE RENO=#{reparent}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=#{reno} AND RENO!=#{reno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N'
SELECT RENO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR1 INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR2 ON TBR2.BRDNO=TBR1.BRDNO AND TBR1.REORDER >TBR2.REORDER AND TBR1.REDELETEFLAG='N' SET TBR1.REORDER = TBR1.REORDER - 1 WHERE TBR2.RENO=#{reno}
mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BRDNO, CU.USERNM, TB.USERNO, BRDTITLE, BRDMEMO , LEFT(TB.REGDATE, 10) as REGDATE , RIGHT(TB.REGDATE, 8) as REGTIME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) as BRDHIT FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TB.USERNO WHERE TB.DELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO > #{brdno} ORDER BY BRDNO limit 20

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM, TBR.USERNO, REMEMO, REGDATE FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TBR.USERNO AND RENO > #{field2} AND BRDNO <= #{field1} WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY RENO
SELECT BRDNO as parentPK, FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE FILENO > #{field2} AND BRDNO <= #{field1} AND DELETEFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY FILENO
